hero.title: Iconic pre-loved fashion
hero.subtitle: Explore our curated collection of exceptional bags, shoes, and accessories that are worth investing in.

midBanner.title: Collector's selection
midBanner.subtitle: Our products are unique because each of them has its own story.

ourStoryShort.title: Our Story
ourStoryShort.text_1: Gibbarosa was born out of a love for history, heritage, and the savoir-faire of luxury fashion houses.
ourStoryShort.text_2: We give a second life to timeless pieces that should be treated as true investments.

footer.tagline: Surround yourself with beautiful, timeless products.
footer.disclaimer: All items available on Gibbarosa are second-hand and used. No brand owner of products available on Gibbarosa is associated with or sponsors Gibbarosa. Brand trademarks are the property of their respective brand owners.
